009package Edge_Preserving_Smoothing;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
013import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
014import ij.process.ColorProcessor;
015import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
016import imagingbook.common.filter.edgepreserving.KuwaharaFilterScalar;
017import imagingbook.common.filter.edgepreserving.KuwaharaFilterVector;
018import imagingbook.common.filter.edgepreserving.KuwaharaF.Parameters;
019
020/**
021 * Scalar version. Applied to color images, each color component is filtered separately.
022 * This plugin demonstrates the use of the Kuwahara filter, similar to the filter suggested in 
023 * Tomita and Tsuji (1977). It structures the filter region into  five overlapping, 
024 * square subregions of size (r+1) x (r+1). Unlike the original Kuwahara filter,
025 * it includes a centered subregion. This plugin works for all types of images and stacks.
026 * 
027 * @author WB
028 * @version 2022/03/30
029 */
030public class Kuwahara_Filter implements PlugInFilter {
031
032        private static Parameters params = new Parameters();
033        private static boolean UseVectorFilter = false;
034        
035        private boolean isColor;
036
037        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
038                return DOES_ALL + DOES_STACKS;
039        }
040
041        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
042                isColor = (ip instanceof ColorProcessor);
043                if (!getParameters())
044                        return;
045                if (isColor && UseVectorFilter) {
046                        new KuwaharaFilterVector(params).applyTo((ColorProcessor)ip);
047                }
048                else {
049                        new KuwaharaFilterScalar(params).applyTo(ip);
050                }
051        }
052
053        private boolean getParameters() {
054                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
055                params.addToDialog(gd);
056                if (isColor)
057                        gd.addCheckbox("Use vector filter (color only)", UseVectorFilter);
058                
059                gd.showDialog();
060                if(gd.wasCanceled()) 
061                        return false;
062                
063                params.getFromDialog(gd);
064                if (isColor)
065                        UseVectorFilter = gd.getNextBoolean();
066                
067                params.radius = Math.max(params.radius, 1);
068                params.tsigma = Math.max(params.tsigma, 0);
069                return params.validate();
070        }
071}
072
